content.html: For anyone else who didn't get the memo: AuthN (auth-N-tication) = You are you. Legit. Glad you aren't spoofing. AuthZ (authori-Z-ation) = You have permission for this door. Welcome. Oh -- but not that door. Sorry.
content.value:
For anyone else who didn't get the memo:

AuthN (auth-N-tication) = You are you. Legit. Glad you aren't spoofing.

AuthZ (authori-Z-ation) = You have permission for this door. Welcome. Oh -- but not that door. Sorry.
